arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim insists Man United's set-piece struggles are his responsibility after Bournemouth defeat as new manager rushes to defence of assistant Carlos Fernandes
arts.sum: CHRIS WHEELER: Ruben Amorim accepted responsibility for Manchester United's latest setback as they sank to defeat at home to Bournemouth on Sunday afternoon..

arts.ttl: Bournemouth up to FIFTH after stunning win at Man Utd
arts.sum: Another disappointing performance at both ends of the pitch means United – who visit a Wolverhampton Wanderers side on Boxing Day fresh from a 3-0 win at Leicester City – will spend Christmas in the bottom half of the table for the first time since the 1989/90 season, when they were 12th. Chances were hard to come by in the opening stages as Amad tamely fired straight at Kepa Arrizabalaga, while Semenyo tested Andre Onana's handling from range at the other end.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth fans dream of Europe after humbling Man Utd
arts.sum: Bournemouth fans sing about European qualification after winning 3-0 at Manchester United for the second successive season.

arts.ttl: Amorim says Manchester United were nervous in rout by Bournemouth
arts.sum: Visitors enjoy successive 3-0 wins at Old Trafford ‘I felt it from the first minute, there’s a lot of anxiety’ Ruben Amorim has admitted Manchester United’s players were nervous on Sunday during their 3-0 defeat by Bournemouth, which left the club 13th and in the bottom half on Christmas Day for the first time since 1989. The defeat was a second in a row by that scoreline at home against Bournemouth, almost exactly a year after the first. United went behind to the seventh goal they have conceded in the past six games at a set play. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Old Trafford ceiling leaks during Ruben Amorim press conference after Bournemouth loss
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim was giving his thoughts of Manchester United's embarrassing 3-0 loss to Bournemouth at Old Trafford before the ceiling began leaking to compound the club's woes

arts.ttl: Amorim says Manchester United players and fans are suffering after Bournemouth defeat – video
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim said Manchester United's players and fans were 'suffering' after a damaging 3-0 Premier League loss to Bournemouth at Old Trafford. Dean Huijsen exposed United's frailties from set pieces with a first-half header before Justin Kluivert and Antoine Semenyo added goals after the break to secure three points for the visitors Semenyo seals stunning Bournemouth win to add to Manchester United misery Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim urges Manchester United players to ignore 'nervous' Old Trafford after heavy Bournemouth defeat
arts.sum: Amorim has already tasted defeat four times as Man United boss

arts.ttl: Bournemouth boss Andoni Iraola rubs salt into Ruben Amorim's wounds after thrashing Man Utd
arts.sum: Andoni Iraola's Bournemouth claimed a 3-0 win away at Manchester United for the second season running to move six points clear of Ruben Amorim's side after 17 games

arts.ttl: Iraola happy with 'solid & mature' Bournemouth performance
arts.sum: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola says he is happy with his side's "solid and mature" performance after beating Manchester United 3-0 at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim's press conference is interrupted by water dripping from the ceiling after Man United's defeat by Bournemouth in what appears to be ANOTHER leak at Old Trafford
arts.sum: The club's struggles on the pitch may not be the only issue the Amorim needs to contend with as he attempts to restore United to their former glory.
